title: EZ Goal Folding Hockey Training Goal Net w/ Backstop, Targets, & Shooter Tutor , Red/White, 2-Inch
features: Curved pro style frame and top shelf
2" Powder coated 18 gauge steel frame with rigid construction
10' x 6' Backstop rebounds pucks and keeps them from hitting your garage
Pro Shooter tutor with 5 targets (Lifetime Warranty On Goal Net)
Patent pending Rock Solid folding mechanism for storing flat
description: Practicing on goal is essential, but it's hard to picture what it's like with a goalie blocking your way and it's a huge waste of time to chase down pucks constantly. Solve all your practice problems with the EZ Goal 2 in. Folding Steel Hockey Goal with Backstop, Shooter Tutor, & Targets (Lifetime Warranty On Goal Net). This unique practice goal features a regulation full-size 4- x 6-foot hockey goal made with 2-inch diameter steel tubing and a ton of practice extras. It's surrounded by a removable 10- x 6-foot backdrop with the same puck-proof net as the goal, so your errant shots stay nearby. You'll also get the Shooter Tutor, a removable goal cover that simulates a skilled goalie and leaves only the four corners and a small center target available. EZ Goal is the name you can rely on to perfect your game on the court, the pitch, or the ice! This Connecticut-based company makes a variety of sports accessories, everything from hockey to baseball. An all-star is born with every new product sold, and every product sold is a built to last. Each piece is made from the most durable materials and designed for optimal convenience. To make a good player into a great player, there's no better brand than EZ Goal. Regulation practice goal with huge netted backdrop. 2-inch diameter red powder-coated steel construction. 10- x 6-foot backstop with puck-proof pro net. Removable shooter tutor with perfect targets. Manufacturer's 1-year warranty included.
